short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Darkblock Chrome Browser Extension for Consuming Unlockable Content

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Darkblock Chrome Extension enables users to unlock their content associated with NFTs on other websites besides app.darkblock.io. This is an experimental extension to show the decentralized nature of the Darkblock content. You can unlock content that is token-bound to NFTs with the Darkblock Protocol on Opensea, Magic Eden, Solsea, and Exchange.art. To read more about the Darkblock Chrome Extension you can see our blog post here: https://www.darkblock.io/news/opensea-chrome-extension/
and check out this video about it here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xEGgxzKNzUU
